snippet: Three decades after Michael Keating struck up a close friendship with his neighbor Clyde Day, he began to document the retiree's life. "We need to look across the street from us," he said, "and look after our neighbors."
abstract: Three decades after Michael Keating struck up a close friendship with his neighbor Clyde Day, he began to document the retiree's life. "We need to look across the street from us," he said, "and look after our neighbors."
